content.rendered: Non-fungible token (NFT) are unique and non-interchangeable tokens on a blockchain that represent real or virtual assets like artworks, images, or other types of digital files. Tokenized artworks like Cryptopunks or CyberKongz became extremely popular in 2021 and many NFTs gained a lot of value. We also see a lot of new projects and artists that decide to airdrop NFTs for free. Below you will find a list of NFT airdrops.
